headline: 3 Consumer Stocks Walking a Fine Line
summary: Consumer staples are considered safe havens in turbulent markets due to their inelastic demand profiles. But they’re also double-edged swords as they often lag in booming conditions, and this pattern has persisted recently. Over the past six months, the industry has recorded a loss of 7.9%, a far cry from the S&P 500’s 6.7% ascent.
